descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Arial]

[b][size=6]My character presets for racemenu.[/size][/b]
[/font][font=Arial][size=5]Grelga, Lucinda, Arnora, Misty and Siggy.[/size]
[/font][font=Arial]
[size=4][b]-----[/b][/size]

[size=3]They are all Nord females.
[/size][/font][font=Arial][size=3]Grelga is basically a younger Mjoll the Lioness.
Lucinda was designed to be a vampire.
Arnora and Misty are meant to look like sisters.
Siggy was designed to look like a young adventurer.[/size][/font][/center][font=Arial]
[center][size=4][b]-----[/b][/size]

[size=3]Give me an endorsement if you like them and please add an image of your character.
I would really like to see some of your alterations and tweeks.[/size]


[size=4][b]-----[/b][/size][/center]

[size=3][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=3]Racemenu
[/size][/url]
[b][size=3]Recommended:[/size][/b]
[/font][font=Arial][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4869/?]Covereyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]
[/size][/font]
[center][font=Arial][size=4][b]-----[/b][/size]
[/font][/center]
[font=Arial][b][size=3]Installation:[/size][/b]
[i][size=2](I have included both the .jslot files for the presets folder, .nif and .dds files for the CharGen folder)
[/size][/i]
[/font][size=3]Download manually and extract the .nif and .dds files to Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen.[/size]

[size=3]Extract the .jslot files to Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets.[/size]

[font=Arial][size=4][b][center][/center][center]-----[/center]
[/b][/size][/font]
[b][size=4]NOTE![/size][/b] [font=Arial][size=3]Different [/size][/font]S[size=3]kin textures and head meshes etc may change how your character will look like.[/size]
[b]
[b][font=Arial][size=4][center]-----[/center]
[/size][/font][/b]
[/b][b][size=4]Permission:[/size] [/b][size=3]I would appreciate if you didn't upload this anywhere else! But other than that, feel free to use my presets as a template for your own creations.

[/size][b][b][font=Arial][size=4][center]-----[/center][/size][/font][/b][/b][b]
[/b][center][b][size=5]Credits:
[/size][/b]
[size=3]Racemenu [/size][i][font=Arial][size=2]By[/size][/font][/i][size=3] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?][font=Arial][size=3]Expired[/size][/font][/url][font=Arial]
[/font]
[size=3]Women of Skyrim[/size] [i][font=Arial]By[/font] [/i][font=Arial][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2689072/?]zzjay[/url]

[/size][/font][font=Arial][size=3]Covereyes [/size][/font][font=Arial][size=2][i]By[/i][/size][/font][font=Arial][size=3] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2788925/?]mrLenski[/url]

KS Hairdos [/size][/font][font=Arial][size=2][i]By[/i][/size][/font][font=Arial][size=3] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665/?]Kalilies[/url][/size][/font][/center][font=Arial][size=3]
[/size][/font]
author: Nercis
